{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ZyXEL Keenetic Lite II.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = ZyXEL Keenetic Lite II Internet Center |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://keenetic.com/ru/zyxel-keenetic-lite-2 |ppalt = (RU) |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ZyXEL |model = Keenetic Lite |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = II rev A |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/29/2019‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ZyXEL_Keenetic_Lite_II |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, access point |sernum = EMG1302-R10A |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2011500149 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620N; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 / 600 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Eon;EN25Q64-104HIP; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = ESMT;M13S5121632A; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 28:28:5D, EC:43:F6 |oui = 28:28:5D, EC:43:F6
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.112;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = Keenetic-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = TP-LINK |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2013 |estprice = ‪25 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *For dedicated Ethernet line, :with Wi-Fi 802.11n (300Mbps) :Access point and Ethernet switch Very similar to [[ZyXEL Keenetic Omni]] {{See also|ZyXEL/Keenetic series}}
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=811223 ''ZyXEL Keenetic Lite II'' on '''4pda''' forums] (RU) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61568 ''ZyXEL Keenetic 2013-2014'' on '''iXBT''' forums] (RU)
===Modifications=== *[http://www.wisherw.ru/?post=20 ''Add USB ports'' on '''Wisherw'''] (RU) *[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=551476&view=findpost&p=29720338 ''Third party firmware OpenWrt'' on '''4pda''' forums] (RU) *[http://warmwave.ru/files/openwrt/ ''Third party firmware OpenWrt'' on '''WarmWave'''] (RU)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_keenetic_lite_rev._b |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.5 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here

====Keenetic Lite Models==== *[[ZyXEL Keenetic Lite rev A]] :CPU: [[Ralink]] RT3050 (MIPS24Kc) @320MHz, Flash: 4MB, RAM: 32MB :WLAN: WiSoC 1T1R/150Mbps (2.4GHz), Switch: 5x FE (10/100) *[[ZyXEL Keenetic Lite rev B]] :CPU: [[Ralink]] RT5350 (MIPS24Kc) @360MHz, Flash: 8MB, RAM: 32MB :WLAN: WiSoC 1T1R/150Mbps (2.4GHz), Switch: 5x FE (10/100) *[[ZyXEL Keenetic Lite II]] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N (MIPS24Kc) @580MHz, Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB (DDR1) :WLAN: WiSoC 2T2R/300Mbps (2.4GHz), 2x 3dBi (fixed ext), Switch: 5x FE (10/100) *[[ZyXEL Keenetic Lite III]] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N (MIPS24Kc) @580MHz, Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB (DDR1) :WLAN: WiSoC 2T2R/300Mbps (2.4GHz), 2x 3dBi (fixed ext), Switch: 5x FE (10/100) *[[ZyXEL Keenetic Lite III rev B]] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628N (MIPS24Kc) @575MHz, Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB (DDR2) :WLAN: WiSoC 2T2R/300Mbps (2.4GHz), 2x 5dBi (fixed ext), Switch: 5x FE (10/100) *'''[[Keenetic Lite (KN-1310)]]''' - PCB ID: 2050501028 ([[TP-LINK]]) • [http://blog.keenetic.ru/new-keenetic-lite-kn-1310-with-lna/ Blog] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628N (MIPS24Kc) @575MHz, Flash: 16MB, RAM: 64MB (DDR2) :WLAN: WiSoC 2T2R/300Mbps (2.4GHz), 2x 5dBi (eLNA), Switch: 5x FE LED, Mode
